import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import Currency from './Currency' import Form from './Form' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import logo from './img/logo.png' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBars } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function App() { const cash = useSelector(state => state.money.current) const money = useRef('') return (

${cash}

) }
